full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 161 of 236 1065 LC3KMAX6 Parkinson - Direct 1 A. The main building, the residence. And this is various directions. 2 Q. Do these exhibits fairly and accurately depict portions of 3 the second floor of the main house at 358 El Brillo Way as it 4 appeared on October 20, 2005? 5 A. True. 6 MS. COMEY: Your Honor, the government offers these in 7 evidence. 8 MR. EVERDELL: No objection, your Honor. 9 THE COURT: Okay. The range again? 10 MS. COMEY: 289 through 293. 11 THE COURT: 289 through 293 are admitted. 12 (Government's Exhibits 289 through 293 received in 13 evidence) 14 MS. COMEY: May we publish, your Honor? 15 THE COURT: You may. 16 MS. COMEY: Ms. Drescher, would you please just pull 17 up Government Exhibit 289. 18 BY MS. COMEY: 19 Q. What do we see here? 20 A. This is on the second floor of the main residence. You are 21 just now coming up the spiral staircase, and you are now facing 22 south. 23 MS. COMEY: Would you please turn now, Ms. Drescher, 24 to Government Exhibit 293. 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
